title: Sandipan Dey: Probabilistic Deep Learning with Tensorflow
content: In this blog, we shall discuss on how to implement probabilistic deep learning models using Tensorflow. The problems to be discussed in this blog appeared in the exercises / projects in the coursera course “Probabilistic Deep Learning“, by Imperial College, London, as a part of TensorFlow 2 for Deep Learning Specialization. The problem statements / … Continue reading Probabilistic Deep Learning with Tensorflow
